profileEnricher.uploadLabel: Upload CV/Resume or LinkedIn Profile URL
profileEnricher.uploadPlaceholder: Paste LinkedIn URL or click Upload
profileEnricher.uploadHelpText: AI will read the document to help complete your profile.
profileEnricher.validatorMessage: Did you mean Data Analytics (SKL-045)? Using standard codes helps keep our data consistent.
profileEnricher.aiInsightsText: Based on resume analysis, Somchai shows strong potential for an Area Sales Manager role with targeted development in leadership and strategic planning.
profileEnricher.uploadOrEnrich: Upload CV or use AI Enricher
profileEnricher.reqMasterLists: Master lists of job codes & skills
profileEnricher.painPointText: Manual profile entry leads to incomplete, inconsistent, or poorly coded data (e.g., skills, job titles), making reporting and analysis difficult.
profileEnricher.aiSolutionPoint1: Profile Enricher (LLM): Reads uploaded CVs/resumes or LinkedIn profiles (handling Thai & English) to automatically extract and fill fields like total experience, skills, activities, and religion.
profileEnricher.aiSolutionPoint2: Validator Bot: When users manually enter data (like skills or job titles), the AI checks against the company's standard codes (taxonomy). If it finds a likely mismatch or an unknown term, it suggests the closest official code in a pop-up.
profileEnricher.exampleScenarioText: A new hire uploads their CV. The AI pre-fills ~90% of their profile fields. They manually type "data scientist" as a skill; the Validator Bot suggests the official code "Data Scientist (JT-123)".
profileEnricher.benefitTime: Saves Time: Drastically reduces manual data entry for employees and HR.
profileEnricher.benefitQuality: Improves Data Quality: Ensures profiles are more complete and use standardized codes.
profileEnricher.benefitAnalytics: Enables Better Analytics: Provides clean, rich data foundation for subsequent AI features like skill gap analysis and matching.
profileEnricher.benefitCleanup: Reduces HR Clean-up: Minimizes the need for manual correction of inconsistent data.

skillGap.legendModerateTooltip: Moderate gap that should be addressed soon
skillGap.legendMinorTooltip: Minor or no gap; skills are aligned with requirements
skillGap.departmentViewSubTitle: Comparing current team skills against requirements for Area Sales Manager.
skillGap.gapHoverInstruction: Hover over gap status for details and recommendations.
skillGap.readinessSubTitle: Potential successors for Area Sales Manager with attrition risk assessment.
skillGap.individualViewSubTitle: Select an employee to view their personal skill gaps
skillGap.aiInsightText: High potential (85% Readiness) for Area Sales Manager role, but significant Negotiation gap (-3.0) requires urgent attention. High flight risk (75%) necessitates immediate retention focus.
skillGap.timelineEvent1Desc: Completed the 6-week leadership program with certification
skillGap.timelineEvent2Desc: 4 sessions completed out of 8 total sessions
skillGap.timelineEvent3Desc: 2-day intensive negotiation skills bootcamp to address critical gap
skillGap.strategicViewStatReadinessDesc: Sales team readiness for strategic goals (vs last Q)
skillGap.strategicViewStatGapsDesc: Critical gaps across department (vs last Q)
skillGap.strategicViewDistSubTitle: Focus on skills critical for Q3 strategic goals.
skillGap.strategicViewRec1Desc: 30% of sales team members are below standard (Gap: -3.0 avg) in negotiation, directly impacting close rates. AI identifies this as the highest impact area for training investment.
skillGap.strategicViewRec1Suggestion: AI Suggestion: Implement targeted workshops, prioritizing Key Account Managers first due to direct revenue impact.
skillGap.strategicViewRec2Title: Mitigate Retention Risk for Key Talent
skillGap.strategicViewRec2Desc: AI predicts high flight risk (75%) for Anucha P. (Ready Now successor) and medium risk (55%) for Pichai R. (Needs Development). Loss impacts succession pipeline for Area Sales Manager.
skillGap.strategicViewRec2Suggestion: AI Suggestion: Initiate immediate retention talks with Anucha P. (compensation review, career pathing). Develop accelerated plan for Pichai R. focused on Strategic Planning.
skillGap.strategicViewRec3Title: Leverage Leadership Strengths for Peer Development
skillGap.strategicViewRec3Desc: 60% of team shows proficiency in leadership skills. AI identifies potential mentors like Supaporn K. (Ready Now, Low Risk).
skillGap.strategicViewRec3Suggestion: AI Suggestion: Implement a peer mentoring program pairing proficient leaders with those 'Developing' (30%) to accelerate skill uplift efficiently.
skillGap.explanationBoxPainPointText: HR lacks visibility into talent readiness and attrition risk. Manual skill gap analysis is time-consuming, and executives need quick workforce skills insights.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution1: Skill-Gap Analyzer: Compares current skills against role requirements to identify gaps.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution2: Skills Heat-Map: Visualizes strengths and weaknesses (Red/Yellow/Green) for quick overview.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution3: Readiness & Flight-Risk Predictor: Scores employee readiness for future roles and predicts attrition likelihood.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution4: Auto-CDP Updater: Consolidates data from various sources for accurate predictions.
skillGap.explanationBoxExampleText: A manager reviews their team dashboard and identifies a critical gap in "Strategic Planning" plus two "Ready Now" successorsâ€”one flagged as "High" flight risk requiring immediate action.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit1: Proactive Succession Planning: Identify future leaders using data-driven readiness scores.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit2: Targeted Retention: Focus on high-potential flight risks.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit3: Data-Driven L&D: Focus training on critical skill gaps.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit4: Strategic Insights: Clear visibility into skill health and talent pipeline.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit5: Real-time Data: Current insights without manual consolidation.
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec1Desc: Addresses the most critical skill gap across the department
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec2Title: Schedule retention discussion with Anucha P.
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec2Desc: High flight risk for a "Ready Now" successor requires immediate attention
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec3Desc: Could be ready sooner with targeted development in Strategic Planning

idpBuilder.painPointText: Creating meaningful Individual Development Plans (IDPs) is time-consuming for managers and often results in generic, ineffective plans that don't align with the 70-20-10 model for optimal learning.
idpBuilder.aiSolutionPoint1: 70-20-10 IDP Builder: Analyzes an employee's profile (current role, skills, identified gaps, aspirations) and organizational data (available mentors, projects, courses).
idpBuilder.aiSolutionPoint2: Generates Balanced Draft: Automatically drafts a suggested IDP structured around the 70% (experience), 20% (exposure), and 10% (education) learning model.
idpBuilder.aiSolutionPoint3: Suggests Specific Activities: Recommends concrete actions for each category, linking to relevant internal resources like specific projects, potential mentors (using the matching engine), or LMS courses.
idpBuilder.exampleScenarioText: A manager clicks "Generate IDP" for Somchai (Sales Rep aspiring to Area Manager). The AI drafts a plan including: 70% - leading a small cross-functional sales initiative, 20% - shadowing the current Area Manager, 10% - completing the online "Strategic Sales Planning" course.
idpBuilder.benefitManagerTime: Saves Manager Time: Reduces IDP creation time significantly (Target: -80%).
idpBuilder.benefitEffectiveness: Improves Plan Effectiveness: Creates more structured, actionable, and balanced development plans.
idpBuilder.benefitAlignment: Aligns Development: Connects learning activities directly to skill gaps and career goals.
idpBuilder.benefitResourceUtil: Utilizes Resources: Promotes relevant internal projects, mentors, and courses.
idpBuilder.idpItem70_2_Focus: Focus: Leadership Observation, Market Analysis Exposure
idpBuilder.idpItem20_1_Title: Mentorship with Supaporn K. (Key Account Mgr)
idpBuilder.idpItem20_2_Title: Join Sales Strategy Community of Practice

adaptiveLearning.aiAssistantWelcome: Welcome to your personalized SAP learning experience! I'll adapt your learning path based on your performance and learning style.
adaptiveLearning.courseTitle: Course: SAP Basics for Sales Teams
adaptiveLearning.alternativePathAcceleratedDesc: For learners with SAP experience, skips introductory content.
adaptiveLearning.completionMessageTitle: Congratulations! You have completed the course.
adaptiveLearning.completionMessageText: Your certificate has been issued and added to your profile.
adaptiveLearning.currentActivityPlaceholder: Select an item from the learning path to begin.
adaptiveLearning.aiRecommendationDefaultText: Based on your performance, I recommend focusing on understanding the Sales Order transaction codes.
adaptiveLearning.reqContentGraph: Content dependency graph (which module unlocks next)
adaptiveLearning.painPointText: Traditional courses don't adapt to individual needs, causing learners to get stuck or bored when content is too hard or too easy.
adaptiveLearning.aiSolutionPoint1: Adaptive Sequencer: Monitors performance through quiz scores and interaction patterns.
adaptiveLearning.aiSolutionPoint2a: For struggling learners: Inserts refresher modules or redirects to prerequisites.
adaptiveLearning.aiSolutionPoint2b: For quick mastery: Allows skipping basic content or offers advanced materials.
adaptiveLearning.aiSolutionPoint3: Issues certificates only after mastering the complete adapted path.
adaptiveLearning.exampleScenarioText: A user fails a quiz. AI detects this and automatically inserts a refresher module before allowing progression to the next topic.
adaptiveLearning.benefitMastery: Improved Mastery: Ensures concept understanding before advancement.
adaptiveLearning.benefitCompletion: Higher Completion Rates: Reduces dropout with personalized support. (Target: +15pp)
adaptiveLearning.benefitPersonalized: Personalized Experience: Tailors learning to individual needs and pace.
adaptiveLearning.benefitEfficient: Efficient Learning: Focuses on areas needing the most help.
adaptiveLearning.activityVideoDesc: A 5-minute overview of the sales order creation process.
adaptiveLearning.activityQuizDesc: 5 questions to check your understanding. 80% required to pass.
adaptiveLearning.activityRefresherDesc: It looks like you struggled with the quiz. Let's review the key concepts before moving on.
adaptiveLearning.aiAssistQuizFail: Hmm, looks like you missed a few on the Sales Order quiz. I've added a quick refresher module to help solidify the concepts. Give it a try!
adaptiveLearning.aiAssistQuizPass: Great job on the quiz! You're ready for the next module on Customer Data.
adaptiveLearning.aiAssistModuleComplete: Excellent! You've completed the SAP Navigation module.
adaptiveLearning.aiAssistPreferenceUpdate: Okay, I've updated your preferences. I'll prioritize text-based content for you.

matching.mentorSectionDesc: AI suggests mentors based on your goals, skills needed, and compatibility.
matching.gigSectionDesc: Discover short-term projects to build skills relevant to your goals.
matching.painPointText: Finding the right mentor or project often relies on limited personal networks, leading to suboptimal matches.
matching.aiSolutionPoint1b: Mentors: Expertise, teaching skills, style, and availability.
matching.aiSolutionPoint1c: Gigs: Required skills, duration, and learning outcomes.
matching.aiSolutionPoint2: Calculates Match Score: Uses algorithms to determine relevance based on skills and past successful matches.
matching.aiSolutionPoint3: Presents Ranked List: Shows top matches with clear reasons for each recommendation.
matching.exampleScenarioText: A user clicks "Find Mentor" and AI analyzes their goals and gaps, identifying two ideal mentors: a 92% match with strong strategy skills and an 85% match with direct experience in the target role.
matching.benefitTargetedDev: Targeted Development: Connects employees with precise resources for growth.
matching.benefitWiderAccess: Wider Access: Exposes employees to mentors beyond their immediate network.
matching.benefitDataDriven: Data-Driven Decisions: Improves match quality and relevance.
matching.gigResult2Title: Assist: Market Research for New Product Launch

nudgeBot.simulationNotice: This is a simulation. Bot messages appear automatically.
nudgeBot.reqLmsStatus: Real-time course status from LMS API (Not-started/In-progress)
nudgeBot.howAiEnhancesTitle: How AI Enhances the Nudge Bot
nudgeBot.painPointText: Learners forget deadlines and lose momentum in self-paced courses, resulting in low completion rates.
nudgeBot.aiSolutionPoint1: Nudge Bot: AI assistant in familiar chat tools like Line/MS Teams.
nudgeBot.aiSolutionPoint2: Monitors Progress: Connects to LMS to check course status and deadlines.
nudgeBot.aiSolutionPoint3: Smart Reminders: Messages users falling behind or approaching deadlines.
nudgeBot.aiSolutionPoint4: Micro-Learning: Provides concise content summaries to help recall information.
nudgeBot.aiSolutionPoint5: Personalized Suggestions: Recommends relevant new courses based on user history.
nudgeBot.exampleScenarioText: Bot detects a user is behind on their course and sends a message: "You're 50% behind schedule. Need a quick recap?"
nudgeBot.benefitDropout: Lower Dropout: Timely reminders keep learners engaged. (Target: -50%)
nudgeBot.benefitCompletion: Higher Completion: Helps learners stay on track to finish courses.
nudgeBot.benefitSatisfaction: Better Experience: Non-intrusive support in familiar tools.
nudgeBot.benefitJitLearning: Just-in-Time Learning: Quick recaps overcome forgetting curves.
nudgeBot.botMsg1: Hi Somchai ðŸ‘‹ Just a friendly reminder that your mandatory 'Compliance Training 2024' is due by Friday.
nudgeBot.botMsg2: Looks like you started the 'SAP Basics for Sales' course but haven't made progress in 3 days. Need a quick recap of where you left off?
nudgeBot.botMsg3: Okay, here's a quick TL;DR for 'SAP Basics' Module 2 (Navigation): 1) Main screens are accessed via Transaction Codes (T-Codes). 2) Key T-Codes for sales are VA01 (Create Order), VA02 (Change), VA03 (Display). 3) Use the Favourites menu for quick access. Ready to jump back in?
nudgeBot.botMsg4: Great job completing 'SAP Basics'! Based on your role and recent learning, you might be interested in the 'Advanced Reporting in SAP' course.
